channel.title: Can som1 teach me to code?
channel.description:
can someone teach me to code a bit? i dont exacly understand things on the java thing..so yea my friend wants me to help him code his pimpscape server and i want to help him make the npcs say diffrence things, edit the shops on what items they sell and all that good stuff..so yea...ill rep u and give u 2m in rs if u help me alot and what u say is true and simple enough for me to understand :)
things i want to learn how to do: make npcs, put new items in shops, make npcs say diffrent things, make lvling faster, i need a program im suppossing so i need that if u can send me a link and i need just some good info on everything :)

item.title: Can som1 teach me to code?
item.dc:creator: @adrian_cruz adrian cruz
item.description:
@adrian_cruz wrote:

well to code something ur self… u cant just learn that quick… so for now u should learn the basics and look for server codes to add to your server… and to edit it u have to open the source… most of all the works go in the client.java ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Can som1 teach me to code?

item.title: Can som1 teach me to code?
item.dc:creator: @Wariors Wariors
item.description:
@Wariors wrote:

well firstly you actually need a source before you can even follow a TUT once you have the source, client and your compile is working then can start thinking about using tuts and they’re located in this forum - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?board=51.0

if you’d of noticed the link i sent you too was actually the TUTORIALS section.

Read full topic

rawr that doesnt help…it teaches how to make a server not edit 1…

item.source: Can som1 teach me to code?

item.title: Can som1 teach me to code?
item.dc:creator: @Wariors Wariors
item.description:
@Wariors wrote:

First of all have you downloaded a source so you have something to work with? if not try this link, follow the tutorial and then if you go into the tutorial section of these forums there’s lots of tutorials you can try. heres the link to get you the moparscape client and get you your source to work with.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36663.0.html

heh in 2 consecutive posts i’ve been able to use that link

Read full topic

item.source: Can som1 teach me to code?

item.title: Can som1 teach me to code?
item.dc:creator: @Wariors Wariors
item.description:
@Wariors wrote:

Well first of all you need a program to edit and add codes, note pad works for the job and second of all you need some sort of basic idea of how to code I’ve only just started trying to teach myself maybe if you downloaded a source and started trying to follow some of the Tutorials for private servers, maybe you could learn like that, which is what im doing and i’m getting there, slowly

Read full topic
